CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 27, 1941, pg. 18, reads: "Hundreds attend YWCA Kiddies' Party - Dozens of kiddies attended the Christmas party sponsored by the YWCA Monday, and Santa (Toni McKamey), brought plenty of treats for everyone. The large reception room was filled with the celebrating youth, and the room was elaborately decorated in real Yuletide style.  The Christmas parties are the annual method of the 'Y' to entertain youthful celebrants. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Toni McKamey dressed as Santa Claus holding child, surrounded by children seated on floor, in Centre Avenue YWCA decorated with Christmas tree, another version
